findings.title: Inspector: protocol
findings.description:
MCP Inspector CLI error for http://127.0.0.1:5001: CLI failed with code 1: node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1147
  throw err;
  ^

Error: Cannot find module '/Volumes/ExternalSSD/dev/insula-mcp/packages/insula-mcp/dist/stdio-wrapper.ts'
    at Module._resolveFilename (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1144:15)
    at Module._load (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:985:27)
    at Function.executeUserEntryPoint [as runMain] (node:internal/modules/run_main:135:12)
    at node:internal/main/run_main_module:28:49 {
  code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND',
  requireStack: []
}

Node.js v20.11.1
Method is required. Use --method to specify the method to invoke.

Failed with exit code: 1
